description: Denominator of average of number of steps in Euclidean algorithm for all GCD(m,n) with 0<=m<n.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Euclidean Algorithm.
prog: (Haskell)import Data.Ratio ((%), denominator)a051012 n = denominator $ (sum $ a051010_row n) % n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 27 2013
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
